import 'react-app-polyfill/ie11'; import 'react-app-polyfill/stable'; import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // core components_chart 입력하는 부분_ // 아래에 차트 이름과, 차트 경로를 입력하면 된다. import chartData from "../../variables/charts.js"; import ReactFC from 'react-fusioncharts'; import ReactFusioncharts from "react-fusioncharts"; import FusionCharts from 'fusioncharts'; import charts from 'fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts'; import Zoomline from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.zoomline"; import FusionTheme from 'fusioncharts/themes/fusioncharts.theme.fusion'; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, charts, Zoomline, FusionTheme); charts(FusionCharts); let dataSource = []; let url = [ "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/difficulty/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/medianconfirmationtime/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/mining-revenue/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/revenue/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/emptyblocks/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/strippedsize/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/strippedsize/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/weight/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/insufficient-strippedsize/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/insufficient-size/value/month", ]; var tag = [ "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "emptyblock_per_day", "avg_strippedsize_per_day", "sum_strippedsize_per_day", "avg_weight_per_day", "sum_weight_per_day", "abnor_strippedsize_count", "abnor_size_count", ]; var title = [ "Sum of Block Size", "Average of Block Size", "Total Block Size", "Difficulty", "Median confirmation Time", "Mining Revenue", "Total Mining Revenue", "Total number of empty blocks", "Average strippedsize of blocks", "Total strippedsize of blocks", "Average weight of blocks", "Total weight of blocks", "insufficient strippedsize-blocks", "insufficient size-blocks" ]; var caption = [ "Sum of daily block Size in bitcoin network.", "Average of daily block Size in bitcoin network.", "Total block size until now in bitcoin network.", "Daily difficulty for create block in bitcoin network.", "To spent time of median confirmation per day in bitcoin network.", "Reward for result of mining per day in bitcoin network.", "Total reward for result of mining per day in bitcoin network.", "The number of empty blocks which have no transaction except coinbase per day", "Average strippedsize (related to witness) of blocks per day", "Total strippedsize (related to witness) of blocks per day", "Average value of block's weight per day", "Total value of block's weight per day", "The number of blocks which have insufficient strippedsize per day", "The number of blocks which have insufficient size per day" ]; class bitcoinBlock extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1" }; } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { for(var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) { dataSource[i] = chartData.renderGraph(url[i], tag[i], title[i], caption[i], i); console.log("임시 데이터 1 - " + i + " : "); console.log(JSON.stringify(dataSource[i])); } return ( <>

Bitcoin Block

.

); } } export default bitcoinBlock;
